sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
under something else
, je prvo neposredno pod drugim.

seg.quote: There was a cask of beer under the bench.
He had no shirt on under his thin jumper.
We squeezed under the wire and into the garden.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
under particular circumstances or conditions
, se zgodi takrat, ko obstajajo določene okoliščine ali pogoji.

seg.quote: The family cannot cope under stress.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
under a law or system
, se zgodi zato, ker zakon ali sistem določa, da se mora zgoditi.

seg.quote: Equal pay for men and women is guaranteed under English law.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
under a particular person or government
, se zgodi takrat, ko je na oblasti določena oseba ali vlada.

Kadar nekdo študira ali dela
under a particular person
, je določena oseba njegov učitelj ali šef.

seg.quote: He has a large number of executives under him.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekdo pri pisateljskem delu predstavlja z drugačnim imenom, lahko rečemo, da piše
under a particular name
.

seg.quote: He wrote an anti-war novel under an assumed name.

sense.def:
Kar je
under an amount or number
, je manj kot navedena količina ali število.

seg.quote: Expenditure this year should be just under 15 billion pounds.
